comment: The antecedent ` A. x ( ph -> x = z ) ` relates to ` E* x ph ` , but is better suited for usage in proofs. Note that no distinct variable restriction is placed on ` ph ` . This theorem provides a basic working step in proving theorems about ` E* ` or ` E! ` . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 3-Oct-2019.)
